name: bj-cmnssmndel

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccmn), wcel(c0, cmnd))
-| wss(ccmn, cmnd)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccmn), wcel(c0, cmnd))
-| wss(ccmn, cmnd)

comment: Commutative monoids are monoids (elemental version). This is a more direct proof of ~ cmnmnd , which relies on ~ iscmn . (Contributed by BJ, 9-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
